languages.text: "Уродливая пародия на благородный дух машины, сотворенная варпом. Порой несколько строк презренного мусорного кода или малый сгусток Движущей силы, попавший под влияние {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}, вырождается в подобную мерзость, оскверняющую мудрость {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} самим своим существованием".

traits.locale_text: "Уродливая пародия на благородный дух машины, сотворенная варпом. Порой несколько строк презренного мусорного кода или малый сгусток Движущей силы, попавший под влияние {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}, вырождается в подобную мерзость, оскверняющую мудрость {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} самим своим существованием".

languages.text: "An ugly mockery of a noble machine spirit, created by the warp. Sometimes a few lines of despicable scrap-code or a small clump of the Motive Force falls under the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s influence and degenerates into an abomination of this sort: one whose very existence is an insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s wisdom."
languages.original_text: "Уродливая пародия на благородный дух машины, сотворенная варпом. Порой несколько строк презренного мусорного кода или малый сгусток Движущей силы, попавший под влияние {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}, вырождается в подобную мерзость, оскверняющую мудрость {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} самим своим существованием".

traits.locale_text: "An ugly mockery of a noble machine spirit, created by the warp. Sometimes a few lines of despicable scrap-code or a small clump of the Motive Force falls under the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s influence and degenerates into an abomination of this sort: one whose very existence is an insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s wisdom."

"An ugly mockery of a noble machine spirit, created by the warp. Sometimes a few lines of despicable scrap-code or a small clump of the Motive Force falls under the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s influence and degenerates into an abomination of this sort: one whose very existence is an insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s wisdom."

languages.text: "Eine widerwärtige Imitation eines edlen Maschinengeists, vom Warp erzeugt. Manchmal geraten einige Zeilen abscheulicher Schadcode oder ein kleiner Klumpen der Antriebskraft unter den Einfluss des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} und es entsteht eine solche degenerierte Abscheulichkeit. Eine Kreatur, deren Existenz eine Beleidigung für die Weisheit des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} darstellt."
languages.original_text: "An ugly mockery of a noble machine spirit, created by the warp. Sometimes a few lines of despicable scrap-code or a small clump of the Motive Force falls under the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s influence and degenerates into an abomination of this sort: one whose very existence is an insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s wisdom."

traits.locale_text: "Eine widerwärtige Imitation eines edlen Maschinengeists, vom Warp erzeugt. Manchmal geraten einige Zeilen abscheulicher Schadcode oder ein kleiner Klumpen der Antriebskraft unter den Einfluss des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} und es entsteht eine solche degenerierte Abscheulichkeit. Eine Kreatur, deren Existenz eine Beleidigung für die Weisheit des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} darstellt."

languages.text: « Une imitation grotesque d'un noble esprit de la machine, créée par le Warp. Parfois, quelques lignes de cet ignoble anticode ou de petites quantités de Force Motrice tombent sous l'influence du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} et dégénèrent pour se muer en abomination de ce genre : une créature dont l'existence même est une insulte à la sagesse de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "An ugly mockery of a noble machine spirit, created by the warp. Sometimes a few lines of despicable scrap-code or a small clump of the Motive Force falls under the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s influence and degenerates into an abomination of this sort: one whose very existence is an insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s wisdom."

traits.locale_text: « Une imitation grotesque d'un noble esprit de la machine, créée par le Warp. Parfois, quelques lignes de cet ignoble anticode ou de petites quantités de Force Motrice tombent sous l'influence du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} et dégénèrent pour se muer en abomination de ce genre : une créature dont l'existence même est une insulte à la sagesse de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. »

languages.text: “是亚空间对崇高机魂的丑恶嘲弄。有的时候，几行可鄙的废码，或是源力的小块碎片会被{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}所影响，堕落成这种可憎之物。它们的存在本身，就是在侮辱{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的智慧。”
languages.original_text: "An ugly mockery of a noble machine spirit, created by the warp. Sometimes a few lines of despicable scrap-code or a small clump of the Motive Force falls under the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s influence and degenerates into an abomination of this sort: one whose very existence is an insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s wisdom."

traits.locale_text: “是亚空间对崇高机魂的丑恶嘲弄。有的时候，几行可鄙的废码，或是原初动力的小块碎片会被{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}所影响，堕落成这种可憎之物。它们的存在本身，就是在侮辱{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的智慧。”

languages.text: 「<歪み>が作り出した尊き機械精霊の醜悪な嘲笑だな。時に、数行の卑劣な破壊コードや動力の小さな塊が{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}渾沌の勢力{/g}の影響を受けて、こういった忌まわしいものの手に堕ちる。その存在そのものが{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}万機神{/g}の知に対する侮辱だ」
languages.original_text: "An ugly mockery of a noble machine spirit, created by the warp. Sometimes a few lines of despicable scrap-code or a small clump of the Motive Force falls under the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s influence and degenerates into an abomination of this sort: one whose very existence is an insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s wisdom."

traits.locale_text: 「<歪み>が作り出した尊き機械精霊の醜悪な嘲笑だな。時に、数行の卑劣な破壊コードや動力の小さな塊が{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}渾沌の勢力{/g}の影響を受けて、こういった忌まわしいものの手に堕ちる。その存在そのものが{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}万機神{/g}の知に対する侮辱だ」

languages.text: «Una fea burla de un noble espíritu máquina, creado por la disformidad. A veces, unas pocas líneas de código basura despreciable o un pequeño grumo de la Fuerza Motriz caen bajo la influencia del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g} y degeneran en una abominación de este tipo: una cuya mera existencia es un insulto a la sabiduría del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}».
languages.original_text: "An ugly mockery of a noble machine spirit, created by the warp. Sometimes a few lines of despicable scrap-code or a small clump of the Motive Force falls under the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s influence and degenerates into an abomination of this sort: one whose very existence is an insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s wisdom."

traits.locale_text: «Una fea burla de un noble espíritu máquina, creado por la disformidad. A veces, unas pocas líneas de código basura despreciable o un pequeño grumo de la Fuerza Motriz caen bajo la influencia del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g} y degeneran en una abominación de este tipo: una cuya mera existencia es un insulto a la sabiduría del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}».

languages.text: "Asil makine ruhunun, öteboyut tarafından yaratılan çirkin bir taklidi. Bazen birkaç satır değersiz hurda kodu ya da Devinim Gücü'nün ufacık bir kümesi, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} etkisine girer ve bu tür menfur bir şeyin ortaya çıkmasına neden olur. Bunların varlığı, {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} bilgeliğine hakarettir."
languages.original_text: "An ugly mockery of a noble machine spirit, created by the warp. Sometimes a few lines of despicable scrap-code or a small clump of the Motive Force falls under the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s influence and degenerates into an abomination of this sort: one whose very existence is an insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s wisdom."

traits.locale_text: "Soylu makine ruhunun, öteboyut tarafından yaratılan ucuz bir taklidi. Bazen birkaç satır değersiz hurda kodu ya da Devinim Gücü'nün ufacık bir kırıntısı, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın etkisine girer ve bu tür menfur bir şeyin ortaya çıkmasına neden olur. Bunların varlığı, {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'in bilgeliğine hakarettir."
